History.Hint: This is your message history. Sent and received messages will appear here while you're logged in and until you refresh your browser.

LAME.WhisperHint: Type your whisper here. Send message by pressing Ctrl-Enter.

Setting.ShowNotificationForNewWhisperHint: Should a visual notification be shown every time a whisper is received?
Setting.PermanentNotificationForNewWhisperHint: Should the visual notification stay until you dismiss it?
Setting.ButtonInSceneControlToolbarHint: Should the button to open the messenger be added to the scene controls toolbar on the left side of the screen?
Setting.ButtonInChatControlHint: Should the button to open the messenger be added to the chat controls (to the right of the roll type selector) in the sidebar?
Setting.ShowInactiveUsersHint: Should users which currently aren't connected be shown in the messenger?

LAME.NoUsersToShowExplanation: Either you are the only user in the world, all other users are banned, or they are inactive and the setting to show inactive ones is disabled.
LAME.UserIsOffline: Can't send to user as they are offline.
